text: ( music playing )
No parents! Whoo! Anarchy!

The king is dead and the kids
are storming the sofa.
Blair! Blair!

They've been gone
for less than ten seconds
and you've already forgotten

Rachel's no shoes
on the couch rule.

Oh, I didn't forget.
I didn't forget at all.
( gasps )

A reckless disregard
for the rules?

That's the worst kind
of disregard.

Blair,
if you blow this for us,

we could be facing
eternal supervision.

Only if we get caught,
which I won't,

because I'm great
at everything.
( doorbell rings )

A stranger.
Our first test.

Likely a spy hired
by Rachel and Dad.
Take it easy, dude.

I just ordered dinner
from my favorite restaurant.

- Just because you're not--
- ( fog horn blows )
( cheers and applause )
( music playing )
Man: Okay, audience.

You see your choices.
One, two, or three.

You guys vote on what
you want to happen next.

Our actors are
leaving the stage

so we can prepare
your choice.
Lock in your vote.

I don't know what
they're about to throw at us,
but it's going to be good.

It's fun when things
happen to you.

It gets you the excitement
and, you know, the jitters.

- Like, ooh!
- Okay, that's it.

- Votes are in. 
- Let's go have some fun, guys.

I feel like our kids are alone
without us, like, for real.

- I totally--
- Let's go back to the scene.
( cheers and applause )
I'm so scared!

Woman:
Ready, and action!
Take it easy, dude.

I just ordered dinner
from my favorite restaurant.
Just because you're not

going to take advantage
of our freedom
doesn't mean I can't.
Greetings, Blair.

I have your order
from Yoga Burger.
As you know, when you order
our famous goat cheeseburger

from Yoga Burger,
you get a free
baby goat yoga session.
Yes.

I've been dying
to do one of those.

- Oh, my gosh.
- Bring on the goats.
( goats bleating )
( bleating )
Why do they have diapers?

- Because goats poop.
- I do, too.

What happens to the goats
after the yoga?
Do they become the burger?

Okay, Owen,
that's enough questions.
I want you guys to follow me.

Our first pose
is child's pose.

- Okay.
- So we go down

- to the ground like this,
- Okay.

- Putting our hands down.
- Okay.

Now we sit back
on our feet like this.

- Oh!
- Oh, my gosh.

- This is very relaxing.
- Isn't that great?

Their sharp little feet
sure are lovely.
Are those diapers still on?
Excuse me. Exu-- oh, okay.

- Owen: Okay.
- Man: Here we go.

Follow me again.
Yes, here we go.
Heads up. Heads up.

- Ooh, yeah.
- Okay. Ow, ow, ow!
Ow! Ow!

I know.
Just hang in there, brother.

- Hang in there.
- ( bleating )

It smells like
one of their diapers
is filled with goat cheese.

Well, I got to go
change these goats' diapers.
Namaste.

- Bye, goats. See you later.
- Bye-bye, goats.
( cheers and applause )
Watch "Just Roll With It"
on Disney Channel.
